## About

Provide a logo and an icon for the company.

## Example

```{.yaml filename="brand.yml (simple)"}
logo: posit.png
```

```{.yaml filename="brand.yml (full)"}
logo:
  small: posit-icon.png
  medium: posit.png
  large: posit.svg
```

```{.yaml filename="brand.yml (light/dark)"}
logo:
  small: posit-icon.png
  medium: 
    light: posit.png
    dark: posit-reverese.png
  large: posit.svg
```
